text: La Diva de la Banda, Jenni Rivera.

There is late word tonight that searchers
have found the wreckage...

...rescue workers searching 
for a plane have found wreckage.

...jet went missing, carrying latin 
music superstar, Jenni Rivera.
This was a woman poised for superstardom.

She went into the sky
 and she never came back.

The missing recorders are so critical
 to understanding this accident.

So you mean to tell me they found
 Jenni Rivera's driver's license,
but they couldn't find that black box.
Who needed to cover up what?
It's a dangerous life to be a singer,

they are more treacherous
 than a rattlesnake.

[IN SPANISH]
I wanted to leave this recorded with you, since...

[IN SPANISH]
...if it is going to end, it will end here.
